Title: Dangerous People
Writer: Richard R. Anasky (story writer), Garo Nigoghossian (screenplay), Garo Nigoghossian (story and screenplay), Garo Nigoghossian (story)
Actors: Angelina Leigh, Vincent Stalba, Garo Nigoghossian, Angel Martin
Plot: Dangerous People takes place in the early 1970's and is about two murders who pick up a girl in a bar and then take her back to their apartment. A moment of brutal violence occurs which ...
